abstract.text: Fetches a list of all lookups enumerated for the specified feature, in
the specified face’s GSUB table or GPOS table. The list returned will
begin at the offset provided.
Increases the reference count on a face object.
Fetches the index of the first language tag fom
that is present
in the specified face’s GSUB or GPOS table, underneath the specified script
index.
Fetches alternates of a glyph from a given GSUB lookup index.
Sets the units-per-em (upem) for a face object to the specified value.
Fetches a pointer to the binary blob that contains the
specified face. Returns an empty blob if referencing face data is not
possible.
Fetches optical-size feature data (i.e., the
feature from GPOS). Note that
the subfamily_id and the subfamily name string (accessible via the subfamily_name_id)
as used here are defined as pertaining only to fonts within a font family that differ
specifically in their respective size ranges; other ways to differentiate fonts within
a subfamily are not covered by the
feature.
Fetches a list of all variation axes in the specified face. The list returned will begin
at the offset provided.
Deprecated since 2.0.0

specified face’s GSUB table or GPOS table.

table Name ID that provides display names for

Normalizes the given design-space coordinates. The minimum and maximum
values for the axis are mapped to the interval [-1,1], with the default
axis value mapped to 0.

or GPOS table, underneath the specified script and language. The list

Tests whether a face has any glyph classes defined in its GDEF table.
Fetches a list of all feature indexes in the specified face’s GSUB table
or GPOS table, underneath the specified scripts, languages, and features.
If no list of scripts is provided, all scripts will be queried. If no list
of languages is provided, all languages will be queried. If no list of
features is provided, all features will be queried.
Fetches a list of all feature-lookup indexes in the specified face’s GSUB
table or GPOS table, underneath the specified scripts, languages, and
features. If no list of scripts is provided, all scripts will be queried.
If no list of languages is provided, all languages will be queried. If no
list of features is provided, all features will be queried.
Fetches the tag of a requested feature index in the given face’s GSUB or GPOS table,
underneath the specified script and language.

. Fails if the
face is immutable.

reference count reaches zero, the face is destroyed,
